amendment.description: Amendment sought to direct the Secretaries to collaborate with the California Department of Water Resources to install a fish screen at the Delta Cross Channel Gates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 236 (Roll no. 443).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 236 (Roll no. 443).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
